runs.comm: bangs it in short, and strays down the leg side. Just about carries to the keeper
good length on a fifth stump line, guided off the back foot to point
lots of movement, comes back in to the batsman, cramping him for room, awkwardly played back to the bowler
short and wide and Irfan tries to pull, but he is hurried on the shot and skews in the air straight over the bowler, falls perfectly between mid-off and mid-on
down the leg side again, just a bit of in swing takes it down

this time gone. Poor shot from Atkinson. A repeat of the third ball. Short and wide, and he goes to pull it over the leg side again, but is hurried on the shot once more and hits it in the air over the bowler, where mid-on runs around and takes an easy catch.
drifts down leg side again off a back of a length, 129 kph though
shorter length and wide outside off, Irfan lets it go
back of a length delivery, punched into the covers with a good stride, Munsey lets it go through his legs as they run through for two
edged and four, streaky boundary from Irfan. A bit of away movement off a good length, Irfan flays his hands at it and gets a thick outside edge and flies past second slip
a bit of in swing this time. Irfan doesn't quite pick it, and gets a thick inside edge this time on to his body
easy boundary, short, wide and cut away through cover point. Doesn't quite control the out-swinger well on this occasion
better ball, good length but just a tad wide, easily glided down to third man
poor ball again, short and wide again but Irfan misses the cut
what a shot, just backs himself. Fuller outside off, he clears his front foot and lofts it over cover where it just carries over the boundary
fifth stump line again at  aback of a length, played away to point off the back foot
another wicket. Nizakat gives himself room and tries to belt it through the off side, but it takes the edge and an easy catch for the keeper. Not a great start from HK
short on off and cramps him for room, Chapman tries to nudge it to the leg but doesn't find adequate connection
shot. But finds backward point. Full and wide, driven off the front foot
flat-batted back to the bowler, short and pulled but doesn't find the gap
fuller and outside off, defended back to the bowler.  Wicket-maiden for Evans.
gentle away shape from Sharif, well outside off though. The batsman shoulders arms
tries to smash him down the ground but gets the outer half of his bat without timing, just carries over Mommsen at mid-off and he does well to keep it inside
good ball again, poor shot again. Just a bit of away shape once more but on off this time, Irfan tries to swipe it over midwicket but gets a leading edge which is easily accepted at cover
great shot from the form-batsman. A bit wide and he throws his hands at it off the front foot and finds the gap at cover point
good-looking stroke once more but hits cover. Slightly fuller this time and closer to the off stump, driven off the front foot
driven to mid-off, full and on off, easily punched to the right of mid-off for a single
beats him this time, good length from Evans. Pushes the back of a length ball across Chapman who is beaten off the defensive prod
better stride from Chapman, gets to the pitch off the ball and guides it to point
well picked from Chapman. Evans goes short and on leg, he waits for it and pulls it easily and with great timing, carries flat over the fine-leg boundary
doesn't quite time it well this time, bangs it in again but a little wider of off stump, he heaves it over midwicket for a brace off the front foot
better length this time, back of a length and Chapman is beaten
beaten again, the length is fuller and Chapman tries to punch it off the back foot through cover but a little away movement takes the ball past the edge
strays on leg stump at a fuller length, hit off to midwicket for a brace
corrects his line immediately, back of a length and just outside off, blocked to cover
good lines again, fuller on off, defended to cover but there is a knock-on from cover and they run through for a misfield
drifts on his pads once more, Chapman neatly tucks it into the vacant midwicket region for another couple. Good batting from Chapman
he is hit on the pads this time,and there is an appeal but pitched well outside leg, it rolls away to third man
back of a length again and hitting off stump, blocked solidly to the bowler
great running, drifts on his pads first up, clipped off his legs to square leg and they scamper through for two
good-looking drive but hits the fuller delivery straight to mid-off
tucked away off his pads towards deep square leg
pushed across the right-hander on a good length, glided to point
gets it to move across him again but the line is a bit tighter on off, blocked back to the bowler
good over from Taylor, fuller delivery on off stump, patted off the front foot to cover
full delivery on off stump once more, driven off the front foot but hits cover again
varies his length a she goes shorter but a good line nonetheless just outside off, Chapman is beaten on the cut

great shot and dropped at backward point. Very hard catch. Chapman smashes it off the front foot in the air and it bursts through the hands off backward point, the fielder at sweeper tries to run around and keep it in but fails to do so.
easily nudged off his pads with very soft hands towards deep square leg and there is just enough pace on it for them to get back for a brace

huge wicket for Scotland. Fuller delivery on middle and leg, Chapman tries to tickle it towards the leg side again but just misses a straight ball. Massive wicket for Scotland just when Chapman was looking good
pushed a full delivery across the left-hander, Rath finds no reason to play and lets it go
tossed up on middle, blocked off the front-foot
slower again, 85 kph, defended once more
flatter again but patted back to the bowler
flatter, quicker and shorter, cut away to the sweeper
83 kph, fuller on off stump, punched to cover off the back foot
flighted delivery outside off, drilled down to long-off
overpitched outside off, driven to cover
tucked off his pads towards deep square leg for a comfortable single
shorter on middle, patted off the back foot towards to the bowler
overpitched on middle, lofted over midwicket but not enough timing to carry to the boundary
tries to nudge it off his pads again, just a hint of away movement, and pats it to midwicket
short and wide, and cut away to backward point, good diving save from point, keeps them down to one
quicker on middle, tries to nudge it off his pads but gets a leading edge
just in, needless run. Slower on middle again and hit to midwicket again but the striker is sent back just in time. The throw was swift but just not enough time
slower outside off, hit off the back foot to the sweeper
darted in on leg, hits the batsman's pads
darted in on leg, punched down to long-on
well tossed up outside off, Rath comes down the track but hits it back to the bowler
overpitched on middle, punched to mid-off and they quickly run through
pushed across the batsman at a fuller length, squirted off to cover
bangs it in short and it loops past the batsman's pull
tapped and they run, suicidal run, would have been out if he hit. Fuller and tickled to midwicket where they decide to run
tucked away off his pads to midwicket
hits it straight to midwicket again, not great batting. Fuller and clips it straight to the fielder at short midwicket
back of a length on a fifth stump line, guides it to point. Hong Kong's batsmen have to hit the gaps
the pressure has resulted in the wicket. Short and wide, just needs to get enough bat on it, but doesn't get it. Tries to play it down to third man and gets a thick edge. Another easy catch.
bangs it in halfway down the pitch, emphatically pulled off the front foot but straight at fine leg, just the single
plumb in front. Full and straight and misses the flick. Another wicket for Scotland. Too full and it is hurries on to him, and he is late on the flick. Out from all angles.
shorter length outside off, blocked out to cover with no feet movement
better stride towards the ball but hit to the fielder again at cover. It was overpitched outside off, should have hit the gap for at least a single
tosses it up and it ends as a yorker. Dug out on to his pads
flatter and goes on with the arm, gets a thick inside edge which rolls away to fine leg
short and wide, picks out the fielder again at cover
that is one way to avoid hitting the fielder, hit it over him. He gets on the front foot and lofts it over cover
darted in outside off, square driven to the sweeper
not much flight that over. Darted in on middle again, just a bit of spin. Blocked off the front foot back to the bowler
great bowling from Scotland. Very tight lines. This one too is on a fifth stump line, defended off the front foot to cover
just a tad fuller and wider, drills it off the front foot down to long-off
almost a run out, great fielder from Coetzer at cover. Blocked out to cover and they decide to run, Coetzer is quick on it and hurls a throw at the strikers end. Would have been out if he hit
nice shot, picked off his pads in the air elegantly but finds deep square leg
fuller delivery pushed across the batsman, driven down to long-off
advances down the track and converts it into a full toss. Belts it down to long-off for just one though.
just clears the long-on boundary. First boundary since the eighth over. He skips down the track again, and meets this back of a length delivery on leg and deposit it just over the man at long-on
shorter length, correcting his length from the previous ball, guided down to third man
just clears extra cover this time, Afzal gives himself room and tries to hit it over cover but skews it and it goes high in the air. Mommsen backpedals but is just late on it
bangs it in and well directed at the badge, but pulled to deep square leg
direct-hit and he would have been out again. Hit straight to cover and they run again, Mommsen lines it up and fires a throw but misses. They run an overthrow too.
slower ball on leg, the batsman is through the pull and ends up hitting it on to his helmet as it rolls away on the off side
full delivery outside off, clears his front foot and belts it down to long-off

short delivery and another wicket for Evans - his 14th of the tournament. He bangs it in aiming for the badge, Afzal stays on the back foot and flat-bats it in the air but picks out deep midwicket. Straight down his throat, didn't even have to move.
slower ball, well bowled, just misses leg stump. The batsman moves away and tries to hit it past point but misses. Almost another wicket for Scotland.
slower, short ball. 115 kph. The batsman waits for it and pulls to deep square leg
quicker this time just outside off stump, hit out to cover off the front foot
hoick, but misses. Skips down the track a couple of steps and tries to swipe it over midwicket but misses by a big margin
drifts on his pads at 126 kph, tucked away to midwicket
gets it this time, low full toss on middle, not a bad ball actually. Meets it early and deposits it over square leg for a much-need boundary
and another boundary, better shot this time. Gives himself room, keeps his shape and hits it over extra cover for four

out this time. Not a bad shot to play with third man up but not enough pace on it. The bowler bangs it in short with no pace, Aizaz can only ramp it straight to third man. Big wicket, just when Hong Kong were looking for a big finish
128 kph, fuller and pushed across the lft-hander. He taps it on the off side and runs through. 100 for HK
slower ball on middle, easy ball to hit, but he stays on the front foot and nudges it to fine-leg
low full toss, squirted off the outer half into the off side
drifts on leg, well clipped past square leg, and they can run two as deep midwickets runs around
big full toss, he tries to heave it down the ground but misses it altogether. Tried to hit that too hard.
bowled 'em. Haseeb walks across his stumps and tries to find the fine leg boundary but moves too far. You can't miss those. The middle stump is knocked down.
low full toss and smashed this time down to mid-off, just a bit of a misfield from Macleod. He tips it down to long-on but it carries to the boundary
low full toss once more, skews if off the bat and it lobs just over point. Enough pace on it for two.
square driven off the front foot past backward point, easy two.
very full outside off, squirted down to third man. He was hurried on the shot
boundary for HK. Shorter length on middle and it is swatted away past midwicket

another short ball, another slower short ball in fact. Nadeem is quick on the pull and ends up top-edging it which results in an easy catch for short fine leg. Hong Kong fail to play out their 20 overs.
